name: volumetric
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the measuring of volume: The United States uses its own system of volumetric measurements for most ingredients.
showing or creating something in three dimensions (= length, width, and height) : The team has used a technique known as volumetric display to create moving 3D images that viewers can see from any angle.
More examplesFewer examplesWe will collect goods up to 3,000 kilograms in weight or up to nine cubic metres in volumetric measurement.With this procedure we approximated the volumetric mass rather than attempting to estimate or correlate the measurements with the mass in weight.Picasso loved paradox in both his work and life, playing volumetric representationalism off synthetic Cubist flatness.The evaluated lymph nodes characterized as benign or malignant were then superimposed on the volumetric 3D images, using customized software.
